title: Feedback on a script 'y'
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202210im_/http:/typophile.com/files/yogabomb_3627.png)

I'd like any opinions please on the y character in the above image.  
I've highlighted the area of (my) concern – I'm reasonably happy with it but also very close to it.  
I'd like to keep the line a single weight to support the idea of the bomb's fuse.

Thank you...

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [yogabomb.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317202210/http:/typophile.com/files/yogabomb.png) | 53.09 KB |
author: MrT

comments.content: I personally think the inside of the concerned area should match the inside bowl of the tail of the y.
